CustomField.formula:
IF( AND(ISBLANK(Date_scope_of_advice_accepted__c), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Qualification_Confirmation__c, "Not Qualified"))),
"Outstanding",
IF( ISPICKVAL(Qualification_Confirmation__c, "Not Qualified"),
"NQ",
TEXT(CEILING ( (Date_scope_of_advice_accepted__c- DATEVALUE(Discovery_Meeting_Date_Time__c))/ 7) )
) )
CustomField.label: Meeting Held > Scope Signed (Wks)
